Export.Routine: PRTCLNBAXESP01 ; Rutina de exportaciÃ³n de datos para Baxter q ; Dec 22, 2005 by Mc_Fly - TrakHealth BCN ; Feb 22, 2006 by Mc_Fly ; Mar 01, 2006 by Mc_Fly ; ; Parameters : 1. From Date (not used) ; 2. To Date (not used) ; CREATE(REPID,PAR,USER,%msql) ; create report n (REPID,PAR,USER,%msql) s cli="BAXTER" ; I don't use Merge because ^TEDI is not locked s (doh,doc,epi,tid,ord)="" f s doh=$o(^TEDI("OUT","PIT",doh)) q:doh="" d . f s doc=$o(^TEDI("OUT","PIT",doh,cli,doc)) q:doc="" d .. f s epi=$o(^TEDI("OUT","PIT",doh,cli,doc,epi)) q:epi="" d ... f s tid=$o(^TEDI("OUT","PIT",doh,cli,doc,epi,46,tid)) q:tid="" d .... f s ord=$o(^TEDI("OUT","PIT",doh,cli,doc,epi,46,tid,ord)) q:ord="" d ..... s r=$g(^(ord)),sw=1 ..... s type=$p(r,"\",3) ..... i type'="Auth" s sw=0 ..... s ts=$p(tid,"||",2),cnt=$p(tid,"||",3) ..... s regts=$g(^TEPI(epi,1,ts,cnt)) ..... i $p(regts,"\",4)="" s sw=0 ; Now is not authorised ..... i sw s ^baxter(epi,ts,cnt)="" ..... k ^TEDI("OUT","PIT",doh,cli,doc,epi,46,tid,ord) i '$d(^baxter) q i $$select^MVBCFSM(1) s file=PLIST(35)_"\baxter\"_$tr($zd($h,3),"-")_".txt" s swnewlin=0 i $l($zsearch(file)) s swnewlin=1 o file:"WAS" u file s $zt="err" s (epi,ts,cnt,ti)="" f s epi=$o(^baxter(epi)) q:epi="" d . i $$select^LVBEPVIS(epi,"Y") . s sex=PLIST(5) . s doe=PLIST(10) . s age=PLIST(26) . s mrn=PLIST(20) . i $l(doe) s doe=$tr($zd(doe,3),"-","/") . f s ts=$o(^baxter(epi,ts)) q:ts="" d .. f s cnt=$o(^baxter(epi,ts,cnt)) q:cnt="" d ... i $$select^LVBVISTS(epi_"||"_ts_"||"_cnt,"Y") ... s resdat="" ... i $l(PLIST(7)) s resdat=$tr($zd(PLIST(7),3),"-","/")_" "_$p($zt(PLIST(8)),":",1,2) ... f s ti=$o(^TEPI(epi,1,ts,cnt,"DATA",ti)) q:ti="" d .... s res=$p($g(^(ti)),"\",1) .... s r=$g(^TTAB("TC",ti)) .... s tcsyn=$p(r,"\",12) .... s units=$p(r,"\",2) .... i swnewlin w ! .... s spec="" .... w mrn,"|",doe,"|",tcsyn,"|",spec,"|",res,"|",units,"||",resdat,"|",resdat .... s swnewlin=1 ... ; Because it exist TestSets without results ... k ^baxter(epi,ts,cnt) c file q range(ti,sex,age) n (ti,sex,age,lo,hi) s (lo,hi)="" s w1=$o(^TTAB("TC",ti,4,""),-1) i w1="" q "" s s="\",sw=0 s ran="" f s ran=$o(^TTAB("TC",ti,4,w1,0,ran)) q:ran="" d q:sw . s reg=^TTAB("TC",ti,4,w1,0,ran) . q:$p(reg,s,22)'=sex . s ag=$p(reg,s,23) i ag["-",$p(ag,"-",1)>age!($p(ag,"-",2)<age) q . s lo=$p(reg,s,1) . s hi=$p(reg,s,2) . s sw=1 q err s $zt="" c file q
